channel.title: Data Analysis on Hi, I'm Eric
channel.description: Recent content in Data Analysis on Hi, I'm Eric

item.title: Not So Standard Analysis
item.description: I was listening to another podcast (Your Mom’s House), and another Eric, (who also happens to be another public-education data analyst) submitted an analysis of the episodes using transcripts of the episode. I wanted to add some language processing to my repertoire, so I decided to perform a similar analysis for my favorite podcast, Not-so-Standard Deviations. As previously mentioned, I borrowed heavily from Eric Ekholme’s analysis of Your Mom’s House, which can be found at his website.
